ygData.subject: RE: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bah, whatever. They can simply make it not possible to camp out in the pof. Then you just gate out and zone right back in no problem. Matter of fact, i
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:08 AM 12/16/1999 -0800, you wrote:
>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
>It probably is. Anything involving camping IS taking advantage.
>
>In a REAL tabletop game, the game ending wouldn't keep the person
>from being angry at you. But that is the difference between computers
>and having real people involved.
>

Bah, whatever. They can simply make it not possible to camp out in the pof.
Then you just gate out and zone right back in no problem. Matter of fact, i
never camp out with my necromancer, he just gates out and zones back in,
being bound right outside. Problem solved. But the bard camps cause
otherwise he has to hitch a ride and hoof it back to the gate. Not a
problem, just takes longer than a 30 second camp out.
